name_screen_text_1:
Welcome to TimeBuddy!
Enter your name to get started
daily_welcome_screen_text_1: Good morning, Marius. It is currently 8:34 AM, Monday morning.
daily_welcome_screen_text_3: Replicate one of your old plans
daily_welcome_screen_text_5: Lay down a plan for today
priorities_screen_text_1:
Great! Let's map down your priorities for today.
Remember, you can always go back and edit the plan.
priorities_screen_text_2: What are your main priorities today?
time_shedule_start_text_2: Click on a field to start planning
time_shedule_text_2: You have made a plan for today
